question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. guardrail
B. billboard
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The billboard is clearly in the foreground on the left side of the image, while the guardrail is further back on the right side, making their relative depth obvious without needing a depth map.
